Most Illustrious Sir

By virtue of your letter of the 4th of this month, which I received last night, attached is São Gabriel. On this occasion I ask Your Excellency Joaquim de Faria Correia or Major Manuel Pires to take charge of the invoice and shipment of the cattle troops that must depart from that district for Montevideo, coming from the loan I promoted and the free gift that several citizens have voluntarily offered for the expenses of the present struggle for our independence; for which I direct the enclosed letters to Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency  
Secretary of the Treasury in Piratini, January 9, 1839.  
Domingos José de Almeida

Secretary of the Republic  
Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.  
From the Ministry of the Treasury

In duplicate.
